product_title: Avonee Jumbo Pack XL Pant Diaper
product_description: Avonee Jumbo Pack XL Pant Diapers are ideal for babies weighing 12-17 kg. These 44 disposable diapers provide comfort, protection, and a secure fit, keeping your baby dry and happy all day with leak-proof sides.

product_title: Parachute Just for Baby - Baby Lotion 200ml
product_description: Parachute Just For Baby Lotion is specially designed for babies, infused with Almond milk and Olive oil. This pH-balanced, fast-absorbing, allergy-tested lotion nourishes and scents your baby’s skin.

Philips Avent Natural Baby Bottle Pink, popular with mothers, features anti-colic vent technology, ultra-soft nipples, and a no-drip design. It mimics breastfeeding and is perfect for babies from 1 month old.

Cerelac Stage 1 Rice & Milk 400g is a nutritious baby food for infants 6 months, made with rice flour and milk powder. It supports healthy growth, providing essential carbs, protein, vitamins, and minerals for optimal development and nourishment.

PH-balanced, microbiologically tested baby wipes. Free from paraben, silicone, and alcohol. ingredients: Pure water, propylene glycol, benzalkonium chloride, iodopropynyl butylecarbomarate, fragrance.
JOHNSON'S Baby Soap, enriched with moisturizing lotion & Vitamin E, gently cleanses while preserving moisture, keeping baby’s skin soft, healthy, and protected. No parabens, alcohol, or SLS.

Kodomo Baby Shampoo, enriched with vitamin B5 and chamomile, gently cleanses without irritation. It’s pH-balanced, hypoallergenic, free from harmful chemicals, and leaves hair soft, shiny, and tangle-free.

product_title: Doll Printed Baby Towels With Hood
product_description: The Doll printed Baby Towel with a hood is soft, absorbent, and gentle on baby’s skin. Ideal for both boys and girls, it keeps your baby warm and cozy, preventing irritation and discomfort.

Gorgeous Baby Cartoon Miki Shoes are made with organic cotton for comfort. With colorful cartoon prints, stickers, and a round fit, they’re durable, irritation-free, and easy to wash. Available in Bangladesh.

The LuvLap 360° Baby Walker, designed for babies 9+ months, offers 360° movement, height adjustment, a musical toy tray, and a food tray. Its sturdy, anti-skid design ensures maximum safety, comfort, and easy storage for parents, ideal for travel.

The Baby Silicone Bibs are pink, anti-bacterial, sustainable, and washable. They feature an adjustable neck strap for comfort and security, are lightweight and portable, and are perfect for travel. Conveniently available in Bangladesh for parents.

The slim, compact design is perfect for home and travel, fitting 2 wide or slim-neck bottles and accessories. Interchangeable compartments allow for customized sterilization, killing harmful bacteria in 12 minutes. Items stay sterile for 24 hours after sterilization.
